text:
Use these guides to **manage data** and perform CRUD operations in Weaviate.

The guides cover these topics:

- Manage collections: Manage collections of objects (also called classes in Weaviate).
- Create objects: Create individual objects.
- Batch import: Import data in bulk.
- Read objects: Read individual objects.
- Read all objects: Read all objects in a collection for back up of export.
- Update objects: Update objects.
- Delete objects: Delete individual objects or filtered object groups.
- Cross-references: Manage references between collections.
- Multi-tenancy operations: Operational differences when multi-tenancy is enabled.
name: weaviate-manage-data
